snippet: A plan for a Hartford stadium, to house a minor league baseball team lured from New Britain, stirred resentment from the start in a state weary of intertown feuds and overly optimistic development plans.
lead_paragraph: A plan for a Hartford stadium, to house a minor league baseball team lured from New Britain, stirred resentment from the start in a state weary of intertown feuds and overly optimistic development plans.

headline.seo: Hartford’s Stadium Plan for the New Britain Rock Cats Is a Hard Sell
headline.main: One Team, Two Cities, and None Are Happy
headline.print_headline: One Team, Two Cities, and None Are Happy
